rooms.description: Spacious open living area with floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light and adhering to Vastu principles of inviting positive energy.
Well-insulated master bedroom featuring a small sitting area. Floor-to-ceiling windows align with Vastu guidelines for clarity and openness.
Private bedroom optimized for restful sleep. Minimalist design with floor-to-ceiling windows to allow ample natural light.
Guest bedroom designed for occasional use, featuring floor-to-ceiling window aesthetics that enhance Vastu harmony.
Modern kitchen with functional space. The design incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows to provide natural ventilation and light while maintaining privacy by strategic placement.
Well-ventilated bathroom with minimalistic fixtures. Floor-to-ceiling window in the attached balcony ensures fresh air and aligns with Vastu principles.

Dedicated private gym space featuring robust construction typical of Brutalist design. The area is designed for both functionality and privacy while ensuring proper ventilation through floor-to-ceiling windows.
Storage room for household items, integrated into the overall layout in adherence to local building norms.

openings.description: Large entry door ensuring easy access and maintaining Vastu principles of welcoming positive energy.
Secondary exit aligning with local building norms for emergency evacuation.
Floor-to-ceiling windows placed strategically along the east and west sides to maximize natural light, ventilation, and adherence to Vastu recommendations.
